---
agent: agent
---

Refactor code files and modules in the #codebase to enhance their cohesion, reduce their coupling, and ensure that naming and file structure is unambiguous, relevant to the content and well placed in the codebase.

- Be thorough.
- Use the #todo tool to create and update your plan continuously as you work.
- Start out by analyzing the codebase and finding the most impactful refactors.
- Finish of by resolving all golangci-lint or JSCPD issues, so we finish with a clean and polished codebase.
